1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Pipo and Lili have decided to divorce after 15 years of marriage. However, their dreams of starting a new life are shattered when they are unable to sell their house, and their only way out will be to go on with their divorce but to live under the same roof.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Pipo, afraid of growing old, starts using a hair treatment product and his family begins to mock him for that. They also feel nauseated by the horrible smell the product has. In the meantime, the dispute on how to care for their children goes on. Pipo is trying to make his son like soccer better than dancing. At the same time, he's also trying to dissolve Matilda's relationship with her two boyfriends and wants his father in law to leave the house. Meanwhile, Lili suffers from workplace harassment and starts seeing her husband as a wardrobe. The happiest one in the ...

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: In an effort to reclaim their individual lives, Pipo and Lili undertake an extreme home partition. The house is divided with colored ribbons and schedules are set for each section of the house. This causes discomfort to the whole family. Pipo wants to regain his youth and tries reconnecting with his old friends. He also starts doing gymnastics to get in shape. Meanwhile, Lili is considering undergoing a breast augmentation surgery to regain her self-esteem and youth. The situation explodes when Pipo decides to bring an ex-girlfriend home with him.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: It's Pipo's 40th birthday and there's going to be a big celebration; but what should have been a peaceful and festive day ends in chaos: Lili decides to spit out everything she thinks to her mother in law while Matilda hangs around with her two boyfriends. Nikita is still hopeful and chases Santi everywhere, trying to get his attention. Iggy, together with his dance mates and Grandpa decide to surprise Pipo with a Brazilian carnival, (everything goes well) until one of the gang decides to flirt with Lili and the celebration ends with a group brawl in the pool.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: With the help of Nikita, Lili starts using the social networks to open up to new people and she meets someone who captures her attention. Vera convinces her to go out and party the night away, but the night wasn't of her liking. Finally, Lili attends a singles meet up event to continue her search, but that's the place where she'll meet her worst enemy...

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Matilda finds out that Jota has been cheating on her with another girl, but instead of kicking Jota out of the trio, Matilda chooses to include the new girl in her new loving quartet. Meanwhile, Iggy must attend his long awaited audition for the "Kid's Swan Lake", where his is fighting to get the main role.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: The whole family agrees on one thing: Pipo and Lili need sex urgently. While their (real) lives are negatively charged, Bella and Adonis, their social networks usernames, make an appointment to meet in person. Will they discover their true identities before meeting face to face?

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: After being unable to decide who'll keep the master bedroom, Pipo and Lili agree to put the room up for rent. The chosen one is Ángel, a spiritual counselor followed by a legion of fanatics. Despaired over the idea of losing his place in the family due to the guru's arrival, Pipo devises a plan so everyone can see the Guru's dark side. During a role-reversal game Pipo will expose the true identity of their tenant...

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The battle of the sexes continues. Pipo finds out that Lili and Bella are the same person and begins to manipulate her. Paloma requests Iggy's help to make Ariel jealous. They meet to come up with a plan but their story takes an unexpected turn.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Pipo decides to reduce the household expenses because they are short of money. He is tired of Matilda's boyfriends always staying for the night and emptying the fridge. He forces Matilda to find a job now that she's 18 years of age. In turn, Simon decides to get a job to help with the family's expenses, without realizing that he's getting involved with the Chinese mafia, which will lead to many problems for the whole family.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Pipo is going through a turning point in his life. Lili is traveling to Polynesia on business and he will be in charge of the house. To make up for lost time, Pipo decides to spend some time with Iggy and Matilda; but he hadn't anticipated that Lili's mother had decided to say home until Lili's return, exasperating the family members even a little more.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: After finding Pipo in bed with her mother, Lili decides to leave the house. Vera invites her to move in with her, now that she had kicked Santiago out for cheating on her. While the couples keep on fighting, Marco, Lili's boss, shows up at the house with some potential buyers for the property. Meanwhile, Matilda realizes who her true love is.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: With the sale of the house a done deal, Pipo and Lili are living their last hours as husband and wife. Matilda tells her parents who her true love is. For Iggy, the most awaited day has arrived: He makes his performance on the "Kid's Swan Lake", and dazzles his family with his talent for dancing. Just minutes away from their divorce, Lili and Pipo are thinking about giving it a new try, but an unexpected visit could ruin everything...

imdb.plot outline: After 15 years of marriage, and sick of a relationship that turned into a nightmare, Pipo and Lili decide to get divorced. But their dreams of starting a new life get frustrated when the housing market crisis explodes and they are not able to sell their house. There is no other solution than to continue living with her two children, the maid and a totally crazy grandfather, while trying to rebuild their lives as if they were single again.
imdb.title: Familia en venta
plot: After 15 years of marriage, and sick of a relationship that turned into a nightmare, Pipo and Lili decide to get divorced. But their dreams of starting a new life get frustrated when the housing market crisis explodes and they are not able to sell their house. There is no other solution than to continue living with her two children, the maid and a totally crazy grandfather, while trying to rebuild their lives as if they were single again.::DCerdas
